artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: two pieces of thick cardboard covered with black and white striped fabric, tied through a pair of grommets with black ribbon (bottom ribbon lost); blue printing on cover ("JOSE GUADALUPE POSADA 1851 1913"); interior of front cover is a colored newsprint collage with rust red and turquoise; back cover has grey envelope attached with index and title page; brown shoelace closure
medium: Cardboard, cloth, ribbon, shoelaces, zincograph and offset lithography (?) on paper
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: Cover for "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
